on the PC5 QoS parameters of the UE’s sidelink communication for NR PC5.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: PQI
elementList.description: PQI is a special 5QI as specified in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: PC5 Flow Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for GBR QoS Flows.

elementList.name: Guaranteed Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Guaranteed Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Maximum Flow Bit Rate
elementList.description: Maximum Bit Rate for the PC5 QoS flow. Details in TS 23.501 [9].

elementList.name: Range
elementList.description: Only applies for groupcast.

elementList.name: PC5 Link Aggregated Bit Rates
elementList.description: Only applies for non-GBR QoS Flows.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of PC5 QoS
  flows allowed towards one UE. Value is 2048.

definitionList.name: TNL Capacity Indicator
descriptionList:
The TNL Capacity Indicator IE
indicates the available capacity of the Transport Network experienced by the NR cell.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: DL TNL Maximum Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the transport portion of the cell in kbps

elementList.name: DL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity over the transport portion serving the cell in percentage relative to the DL TNL Maximum Offered Capacity. Value 100 corresponds to the Maximum offered capacity.

elementList.name: UL TNL Maximum Offered Capacity
elementList.description: Maximum capacity offered by the transport portion of the cell in kbps

elementList.name: UL TNL Available Capacity
elementList.description: Available capacity over the transport portion serving the cell in percentage relative to the DL TNL Maximum Offered Capacity. Value 100 corresponds to the Maximum offered capacity.

definitionList.name: NR Radio Resource Status
descriptionList:
The NR Radio Resource Status IE
indicates the usage of the PRBs per cell and per SSB area for all traffic in Downlink and Uplink and the usage of PDCCH CCEs for Downlink and Uplink scheduling.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: SSB Area Radio Resource Status List
SSB Area Radio Resource Status Item
SSB Area DL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area UL GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area DL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL non-GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area UL non-GBR PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL non-GBR PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area DL Total PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area DL Total PRB usage

elementList.name: SSB Area UL Total PRB usage
elementList.description: Per SSB area UL Total PRB usage

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a
  NG-RAN node cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: NR Composite Available Capacity Group
descriptionList:
The NR Composite Available Capacity Group IE
indicates the overall available resource level per cell and per SSB area in the
cell in Downlink and Uplink.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Downlink
elementList.description: For the Downlink

elementList.name: Composite Available Capacity Uplink
elementList.description: For the Uplink

definitionList.name: NR Composite Available Capacity
descriptionList:
The NR Composite Available Capacity IE
indicates the overall available resource level in the cell in either Downlink
or Uplink.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

definitionList.name: NR Cell Capacity Class Value
descriptionList:
The NR Cell Capacity Class Value IE indicates
the value that classifies the cell capacity with regards to the other cells.
The NR Cell Capacity
Class Value IE only indicates resources that
are configured for traffic purposes.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: NR Capacity Class Value
elementList.description: Value 1 shall indicate the minimum cell capacity, and 100 shall indicate the maximum cell capacity. There should be a linear relation between cell capacity and Cell Capacity Class Value.

definitionList.name: NR Capacity Value
descriptionList:
The NR Capacity Value IE indicates the amount
of resources per cell and per SSB area that are available relative to the total
en-gNB resources. The capacity
value should be measured and reported so that the minimum en-gNB resource usage of existing services
is reserved according to implementation. The NR Capacity Value IE can be weighted
according to the ratio of cell capacity class values, if available.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity with respect to the whole cell. Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

elementList.name: SSB Area Capacity Value
elementList.description: Value 0 shall indicate no available capacity, and 100 shall indicate maximum available capacity . SSB Area Capacity Value should be measured on a linear scale.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. SSB Areas that can be served by a
  NG-RAN node cell. Value is 64.

definitionList.name: SSB Index
descriptionList: The SSB Index IE identify an SSB area of an NR cell.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

definitionList.name: NR Carrier List
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the SCS-specific carriers
per TDD, per DL, per UL or per SUL of an NR cell.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: NR SCS
elementList.description: SCS for the corresponding carrier.

elementList.name: Offset to Carrier
elementList.description: Offset in frequency domain between Point A (lowest subcarrier of common RB 0) and the lowest usable subcarrier on this carrier in number of PRBs (using the NR SCS IE defined for this carrier). The maximum value corresponds to 275×8−1. See TS 38.211 [42], clause 4.4.2.

elementList.name: Carrier Bandwidth
elementList.description: Width of this carrier in number of PRBs (using the NR SCS IE defined for this carrier). See TS 38.211 [42], clause 4.4.2.

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of SCS-specific carriers per TDD,
  per DL, per UL or per SUL of an NR cell. Value is 5.
Maximum no. of Physical Resource Blocks of an NR Cell. Value is 275.

definitionList.name: SSB Positions In Burst
descriptionList:
Indicates the time domain positions of the
transmitted SS-blocks in a half frame with SS/PBCH
blocks as defined in TS 38.213 [43], clause 4.1.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: CHOICE ssb-PositionsInBurst
elementList.description: The first/ leftmost bit corresponds to SS/PBCH block index 0, the second bit corresponds to SS/PBCH block index 1, and so on. Value 0 in the bitmap indicates that the corresponding SS/PBCH block is not transmitted while value 1 indicates that the corresponding SS/PBCH block is transmitted.

definitionList.name: NPRACH Configuration
descriptionList: This IE indicates the NPRACH Configuration.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: Anchor Carrier NPRACH Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the NPRACH-ParametersList-NB-r13 IE as defined in 6.7.3.2 of TS 36.331 [9].

elementList.name: Anchor Carrier EDT NPRACH Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the NPRACH-ParametersList-NB-r14 IE as defined in 6.7.3.2 of TS 36.331 [9].

elementList.name: Anchor Carrier Format 2 NPRACH Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the NPRACH-ParametersListFmt2-NB-r15 IE as defined in 6.7.3.2 of TS 36.331 [9]

elementList.name: Anchor Carrier Format 2 EDT NPRACH Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the NPRACH-ParametersListFmt2-NB-r15 IE as defined in 6.7.3.2 of TS 36.331 [9]

elementList.name: Non Anchor Carrier NPRACH Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the UL-ConfigCommonList-NB-r14 IE as defined in 6.7.3.1 of TS 36.331 [9].

elementList.name: Non Anchor Carrier Format 2 NPRACH Configuration
elementList.description: Includes the UL-ConfigCommonList-NB-v1530 IE as defined in 6.7.3.1 of TS 36.331 [9].

elementList.name: Anchor Carrier NPRACH Configuration TDD
elementList.description: Includes the NPRACH-ParametersListTDD-NB-r15 IE as defined in 6.7.3.2 of TS 36.331 [9]

elementList.name: Non Anchor Carrier Frequency Configuration list
Non Anchor Carrier Frequency
elementList.description: Includes the DL-CarrierConfigCommon-NB-r14 IE as defined in 6.7.3.2 of TS 36.331 [9]

elementList.name: Non Anchor Carrier NPRACH Configuration TDD
elementList.description: Includes the UL-ConfigCommonListTDD-NB-r15 IE as defined in 6.7.3.1 of TS 36.331 [9].

rangeBoundList.explanation:
Maximum no. of non-Anchor Carrier Frequency
  Configurations. Value is 15.

definitionList.name: UE Radio Capability ID
descriptionList:
This IE contains
the UE Capability ID as defined in TS 23.003[29].
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

definitionList.name: QoS Mapping Information
descriptionList:
This IE indicates the DSCP and/or IPv6 Flow
Label field(s) of IP packets sent in the corresponding GTP-U tunnel.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

definitionList.name: UE Radio Capability
descriptionList:
This IE
contains UE Radio Capability information.
definitionList.direction: Direction: MeNB → en-gNB or en-gNB → MeNB.

elementList.name: UE Radio Capability
elementList.description: Includes the UERadioAccessCapabilityInformation message as defined in 10.2.2 of TS 36.331 [9].
